name: Punch'N'Block
description:
A boxing game for mobile and PC.

Game is playable with two players, hope you will enjoy it :)

Made for the game jam BUG Fall Jam 2018 and the theme was "Box".

So we decided to make a boxing game rather than making a game about "cubes" :)

Android build is coming soon! Please give feedback by commenting, so i can improve the game.
